    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AbstractBrick
    Base class for all tetromino bricks.
    Bag7BrickGenerator
    Implements the "7-Bag" Random Generator system.
    Board
    Interface defining the contract for a Tetris game board.
    BoardRenderer
    Responsible for rendering the game state onto the JavaFX scene.
    Brick
    Interface representing a Tetromino piece.
    BrickGenerator
    Strategy interface for generating Tetromino bricks.
    BrickRotator
    Manages the rotation state of the active brick.
    BrickStyler
    Handles the visual styling of Tetris blocks.
    ClearRow
    Data class representing the result of a row-clearing operation.
    DownData
    Data class representing the result of a downward movement (step or drop).
    EventSource
    Represents the origin of a game event.
    EventType
    Enumerates the specific types of movement actions available in the game.
    GameController
    The central controller in the MVC architecture.
    GameOverPanel
    The overlay panel displayed when the game ends.
    GamePoint
    An immutable data record representing a 2D coordinate on the game board.
    GameState
    Enumeration representing the possible states of the game lifecycle.
    GuiController
    The View Controller in the MVC architecture.
    IBrick
    Represents the 'I' Tetromino (the long bar).
    InputEventListener
    Interface for handling user input events from the GUI.
    JBrick
    Represents the 'J' Tetromino.
    LBrick
    Represents the 'L' Tetromino.
    Main
    The main entry point for the TetrisJFX application.
    MatrixUtils
    Utility class for performing 2D matrix operations.
    MenuController
    Controller for the Main Menu scene.
    MoveEvent
    An immutable data object representing a movement request.
    NextShapeInfo
    Immutable data holder for the result of a rotation calculation.
    NotificationPanel
    A custom UI component for displaying temporary floating notifications.
    OBrick
    Represents the 'O' Tetromino (the Square).
    RandomBrickGenerator
    A standard random generator for Tetromino bricks.
    SBrick
    Represents the 'S' Tetromino.
    Score
    Represents the dynamic score state of the current game session.
    ScoreManager
    Manages data persistence for high scores.
    ScoringRules
    Utility class defining the game's scoring logic.
    SoundManager
    Facade for managing audio resources and playback.
    TBrick
    Represents the 'T' Tetromino.
    TetrisBoard
    Represents the game board logic and physics engine.
    ViewData
    An immutable snapshot of the game state sent to the View for rendering.
    ZBrick
    Represents the 'Z' Tetromino.
